General.Name: China Fineblanking Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: China Fineblanking Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells hardware parts, mechanical hardware parts, and molding components in Taiwan, rest of Asia, Europe, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: HDD Parts, Vehicle Parts, and Management and Operation. It offers voice coil motors for hard-disk drives; oil plates; and auto components, such as gearbox components, car door locks and seats, hydraulic pumps, brakes, and other stamping products. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.
